about_the_game:
Original Soundtrack for Biosupremacy composed by Miguel Lara. 15 original tracks included.

  • Terra

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.7 and above
  • Processor: 1.7 ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 gb memory video card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.7 and above
  • Processor: 2.5 ghz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 gb memory video card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

name: Biosupremacy - Original Soundtrack

  • Graphics: 2 gb memory video card
  • Sound Card: Yes
